snippet: Four market prognosticators review their previous forecasts for 2011 and make their best guesses for the final quarter.
lead_paragraph: Four market prognosticators review their previous forecasts for 2011 and make their best guesses for the final quarter.

headline.main: So Far, It’s Been a Half-Empty Year for Financial Forecasters
headline.seo: Forecasters Find the More Pessimistic View Is the Fashion - Wealth Matters
headline.print_headline: So Far, It’s Been a Half-Empty Year for Financial Forecasters
